hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa'eed bin Jubair said:"We asked Ibn 'Umar about Nabidh made in an earthenware jar and he said: 'The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade that.' So I went to Ibn 'Abbas and said to him: 'Today I heard something that surprised me.' He said: 'What was it?' I said: 'I asked Ibn 'Umar about Nabidh made in an earthenware jar and he said: The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade it.' He said: 'Ibn 'Umar spoke the truth.' I said: 'What is an earthenware jar?' He said: 'Anything that is made of clay

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ نَبِيذِ الْجَرِّ، مُفْرَدًا
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Soaking (Making Nabidh) in Earthenware Jars
